∵lim⁡x→−∞f′(x)=−1<0\because \lim\limits_{x\to-\infty} f^\prime(x)=-1<0∵x→−∞lim​f′(x)=−1<0,f′(−1)=1−ee<0f^\prime(-1)=\dfrac{1-e}{e}<0f′(−1)=e1−e​<0,f′(0)=1>0f^\prime(0)=1>0f′(0)=1>0,
∴\therefore∴ 存在唯一的m∈(−1,0)m\in (-1,0)m∈(−1,0)使得f′(m)=0f^\prime(m)=0f′(m)=0.
当x<mx<mx<m时,f(x)<0f(x)<0f(x)<0,f(x)f(x)f(x)单调递减,

当x⩽mx\leqslant mx⩽m时,h(x)=(x+1)(ex−1e)h(x)=(x+1)(e^x-\dfrac1e)h(x)=(x+1)(ex−e1​),

当x>mx>mx>m时,h(x)=ex(x+1)−3ex+e,h(x)=e^x(x+1)-3ex+e,h(x)=ex(x+1)−3ex+e,
h′(x)=ex(x+2)−3e,h′′(x)=ex(x+3)>h′′(−1)=2e>0h^\prime(x)=e^x(x+2)-3e,h^{\prime\prime}(x)=e^x(x+3)>h^{\prime\prime}(-1)=\dfrac2e>0h′(x)=ex(x+2)−3e,h′′(x)=ex(x+3)>h′′(−1)=e2​>0.

∴x1⩽x1′<x2′⩽x2\therefore x_1\leqslant x^\prime_1 < x^\prime_2 \leqslant x_2∴x1​⩽x1′​<x2′​⩽x2​.
∴LHS=∣x1−x2∣=x2−x1⩾x2′−x1′=1+b+e+13e−1+ebe−1=RHS\therefore LHS=\left|x_1-x_2\right|=x_2-x_1\geqslant x^\prime_2-x^\prime_1=1+\dfrac{b+e+1}{3e-1}+\dfrac{eb}{e-1}=RHS∴LHS=∣x1​−x2​∣=x2​−x1​⩾x2′​−x1′​=1+3e−1b+e+1​+e−1eb​=RHS.
